footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kaeya | Update Date: 10/21/2023 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Mistsplitter Reforged__
Best-in-Slot weapon on Kaeya in freeze teams, especially when with a character to provide infusion.
__Wolf Fang__
Battle Pass weapon, does have a CRIT passive, but provides good DMG Bonus%
__Light of Foliar Incision, Haran Geppaku Futsu__
Hard to fully use passives, but strong stat-sticks.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Amenoma Kageuchi, Cursed Blade__
Strong F2P weapons that perform well. Amenoma helps to reduce his ER requirements significantly while Cursed Blade is an option as an attack stat stick.

__Harbinger of Dawn__
Niche weapon that can be fairly strong with its CRIT DMG stat and CRIT Rate passive ( >90% HP, which can be easily maintained in a freeze team)
Is less valuable due to how much CRIT Rate the Freeze teams get.

__Favonius Sword__
Recommended when he's played off-field or as a support.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus% |<circlet>  CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge (till ER requirement)|CRIT Rate (up until 45% CR assuming 4BS & Cryo resonance)|CRIT DMG|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Glacial Waltz
**2)** Elemental Skill: Frostgnaw
**3)** Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Normal Attack talents should only be levelled when paired with a character to provide infusions and Kaeya is utilized as an On-Field DPS.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kaeya | Update Date: 08/28/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Mistsplitter Reforged, Primordial Jade Cutter__
Kaeya’s Best-in-Slots in quickswap owing to the large crit stats supplied.

__Lions Roar, The Alley Flash__
Potent 4 star weapons with passives and stats that compliment Kaeya well in Reverse Melt/ Quickswap playstyles.
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Skyward Blade__
When Kaeya’s Energy Requirements are high enough for Skyward Blade’s Energy Recharge stat to be worth noting, it can be a decent weapon option.

__Harbinger of Dawn__
The low base attack issue is largely subsided when Kaeya is played in Reverse Melt as he is usually paired with Bennett — who provides a large attack buff for Kaeya to make use of.

__Amenoma Kageuchi__
Still a relatively strong F2P weapon as the weapon’s ability to lower Kaeya’s Energy Requirement is appreciated in this playstyle. ( unable to capitalize on Kaeya’s A4 )
** **

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
__4 Gilded Dreams__
Strictly better than 2 piece combinations as the artifact set Provides much more Elemental Mastery and Atk% stats, which are much appreciated in Reverse Melt compositions.

__4 Lavawalker__
Usually having almost 100% uptime on the pyro aura, the 4 set effect is maintained rather easily but the artifact set is not something worth farming on Kaeya specifically.

__4 Emblem of Severed Fates__
A potent artifact set to run on Kaeya, especially when he requires a large amount of Energy Recharge of around or over 140-150%.
** **

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
__2+2 piece set combinations Noblesse Oblige, Wanderers Troupe, Gilded Dreams, Emblem of Severed Fates, Gladiators Finale, etc__
Pick the artifact combination with the better substats or use the optimizer instead and let the site find out the best 2 piece combination for your Kaeya.
** **

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet> Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet> CRIT Rate or DMG

fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Glacial Waltz
**2)** Elemental Skill: Frostgnaw
**3)** Normal Attack: Ceremonial Bladework
